subject: [EXTERNAL] Elevated errors with image processing in ChatGPT for paid users

dialog.body:
[THIS MESSAGE IS FROM AN EXTERNAL SOURCE REVIEW CAREFULLY]

------------
New incident
------------

***************************************************************
Elevated errors with image processing in ChatGPT for paid users
***************************************************************

Identified Started July 21, 2025 8:49 AM UTC

We have identified that users are experiencing elevated errors for the impacted services.

We are working on implementing a mitigation.

Affected Components:
--------------------

ChatGPT GPT vision Degraded performance
